arts.ttl: Mbappe reacts after match-winning brace in Real Madrid 2-1 Marseille: ‘Want to do everything the team needs’
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappe was at the centre of Real Madrid’s 2-1 comeback win over Olympique de Marseille last night as he scored a brace to help the team turn the tide. arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso talks Trent, Vinicius substitution, Mbappe after Real Madrid 2-1 Marseille
arts.sum: Real Madrid kicked off their 2025/26 UEFA Champions League campaign with a hard-fought 2-1 victory over Marseille at the Santiago Bernabeu. Xabi Alonso’s men were pushed to the limit, dominating in phases, surviving with ten men after Dani Carvajal’s dismissal, and ultimately holding on with maturity. arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappé wins it for Real Madrid after Alexander-Arnold injury and Carvajal head-butt
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé converted two penalties to secure Real Madrid a 2-1 victory against Marseille in their Champions League group-stage opener despite playing the final stages with 10 men after their captain, Dani Carvajal, was sent off. Carvajal had not started the match, coming on after five minutes when Trent Alexander-Arnold pulled up with an apparent hamstring injury. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Three things we learned as Marseille fell to Kylian Mbappé inspired Real Madrid
arts.sum: On their return to the UEFA Champions League, Olympique de Marseille would fall to a narrow defeat to 10-man Real Madrid at the Santiago Bernabéu Stadium. A strike from Timothy…

arts.ttl: Why is Vinicius Jr not playing for Real Madrid against Marseille in the Champions League?
arts.sum: Eyebrows were raised when the team news dropped from Real Madrid that Xabi Alonso had left Brazilian winger Vinicius Jr on the bench for the game against Olympique de Marseille. So far this season, Vini Jr has scored 2 goals and got 1 assist in 4 games, but he is yet to play the full 90 minutes in any game, with Alonso either starting him on the bench or taking him off before the final whistle.

arts.ttl: Marseille’s Gerónimo Rulli historically busy at the Bernabeu as he keeps Real Madrid at bay
arts.sum: Gerónimo Rulli (33) had a historically busy first half at the Bernabeu. The Argentine made an incredible 10 saves as he kept Real Madrid’s attackers – largely – at bay. …

arts.sum: Real Madrid and Olympique Marseille are locked in an engaging Champions League debut at the Santiago Bernabeu, with both sides scoring within the opening half hour. Los Blancos are back level after conceding their first goal from open play this season. arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Marseille: Confirmed Starting Lineup For Champions League Clash
arts.sum: Real Madrid's Starting XI Against Marseille: Eder Militao partners with Dean Huijsen at center-back, with the young Spaniard set to miss the weekend's La Liga game due to suspension.
